TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MemberDescriptor extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示一个类成员，例如某个属性或事件。

span.span: Represents a class member, such as a property or event.

summary.span: 这是一个抽象基类。

span.span: This is an abstract base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的基类和类。 is the base class for the and the classes. 类提供的事件，说明和类提供了属性的说明。The class provides a description of an event, and the class provides a description of a property. 此类定义属性和方法，以访问其存储的特性。This class defines properties and methods to access its stored attributes. 属性获取的特性的集合。The property gets the collection of attributes. ， ， ，和属性检索这些特定特性的值。The , , , and properties retrieve the values of those specific attributes. 和属性提供成员的名称。The and properties provide the name of the member. 还定义方法来比较这到另一个。The also defines an method to compare this to another. > [!NOTE] > 通常，继承自和类，而不是从此类。Typically, you inherit from the and classes, and not from this class. ## Examples 因为大多数此类的使用情况将不会继承的类上和，这些类中的示例，请参阅。Since most of the usage of this class will fall on the inherited classes and , refer to the examples in these classes.

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，将继承类的特性添加到父类中指定的特性列表。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, adds the attributes of the inheriting class to the specified list of attributes in the parent class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重复的属性，保留添加到列表中的最后一个。For duplicate attributes, the last one added to the list is kept. 具有属性创建一次。The with the attributes is created once. 如果在列表中有重复的属性，保存仅第一个实例;从列表中删除所有后续的重复属性。If there are duplicate attributes in the list, only the first instance is saved; all subsequent duplicate attributes are removed from the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，返回值将是相同`instance`参数。Normally, the return value will be the same as the `instance` parameter. 如果另一个对象已被此实例相关联，或如果实例是一个自定义类型描述符，方法可能返回不同值。If another object has been associated with this instance, or if the instance is a custom type descriptor, the method may return a different value.
